means: 东亚各国的堤岸，码头，同盟

sentence.Network_en: It was nine o'clock in the morning, and half a gale was howling along the Bund.
sentence.Network_cn: 早上九点钟,外滩一带, 狂风怒吼.

sentence.Network_en: Do your Bund friends have contacts with rail workers?
sentence.Network_cn: 你的朋友们仍和铁路工人有联系 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: My sister and I were in the Bund of Shanghai in 1999.
sentence.Network_cn: 1999年元旦,我的小妹和我在上海外滩.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 如果不去外滩（Bund）看看，此趟夜上海怀旧游就算不得完满。外滩是黄浦江西岸的一条步行道，从这里可以眺望对岸灯火璀璨、美 …
